code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import{useContext}from'react';import FeedbackContext from'../context/FeedbackContext';function FeedbackStats(){var _useContext=useContext(FeedbackContext),feedback=_useContext.feedback;var average=feedback.reduce(function(acc,cur){return acc+cur.rating;},0)/feedback.length;average=average.toFixed(1).replace(/[.,]0$/,'');return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"feedback-stats",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:[feedback.length," Review"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h4",{children:[isNaN(average)?0:average," "]})]});}export default FeedbackStats;
